EmailTemplate.name: 21Feb13Web:SuperConnecting.We Missed You Feb21
EmailTemplate.subject: Since You Missed it - Resources from our Superconnecting Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
You were missed at our “Three Expert Tips for Superconnecting: How to Build the Relationships That Build Business" webinar held on Thursday, February 21. Business thought leader and funding guru Judy Robinett outlined her unique networking strategy designed to take your independent business to the next level. Although you were not able to attend, we appreciate your interest. Below you will find links to the material created for the webinar. We hope you find them informative: Recorded webinar <http://f5159bf2f10bd6337d85-21700ed84a5e5d3baebf7221604c63ee.r66.cf2.rackcdn.com/20130221_Three_expert_tips.mp4> (downloads in browser) Webinar slide deck <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO-Superconnecting-webinar-slides.pdf> Featured Speaker Judy Robinett Website <http://www.judyrobinett.com>
